amendment.description: To modify a section relating to limitation on use of funds appropriated to the Service.

action.text: Amendment SA 3896, previously agreed to, was modified by Unanimous Consent.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3896 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 52 - 42. Record Vote Number: 30.

action.text: Amendment SA 3896 proposed by Senator Vitter to Amendment SA 3899. (consideration: CR S42-43; text: CR S42) To modify a section relating to limitation on use of funds appropriated to the Service.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3896 proposed by Senator Vitter to Amendment SA 3899.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 3896 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 52 - 42. Record Vote Number: 30.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3896 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 52 - 42. Record Vote Number: 30.
